name: Fractured Dreams v0.00
description:
You can't ignore them forever.

Fractured Dreams is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.  You explore the dreams of James, and collect effects and tapes in his subconscious.

In this fangame you will find ~
  • Seven effects scattered thoughout the several dream worlds.
  • Three hidden tapes, that typically required effects to access.
  • and, Two endings and a few events to experience.

If you play I hope you enjoy the experience.
